about_the_game:
This DLC for Gravity is primarily focused on providing pack creators with unlimited uploads. Without the DLC, everyone has access to all player-created content. However, in the base game, players will only be allowed to upload 3 packs for others to play. Buying this DLC will allow unlimited pack uploads for the most creative of players.

Besides unlimited pack uploads, this pack has some other benefits. The full list of benefits is:
  • Upload unlimited packs to be played by friends and strangers
  • Show a star next to your name in the leaderboards and on your profile

However, in the base game, players will only be allowed to upload 3 packs for others to play. Buying this DLC will allow unlimited pack uploads for the most creative of players.

Besides unlimited pack uploads, this pack has some other benefits. The full list of benefits is:

  • Show a star next to your name in the leaderboards and on your profile

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17
  • Processor: Intel i3 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game has very low requirements and should run on any Windows 10 computer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel i3 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game has very low requirements and should run on any Windows 10 computer.

short_description: This DLC allows for unlimited pack uploads, skin customization, and a star next to your name for other players to see.
